name: createService
description: Create a service in a project. When using this function, it is best to also create a few default entities and fields unless specifically requested not to do so

projectId.description: the ID of the service in which to create the project

adminUIPath.description: the path in the repo where to save the generated files of the admin UI. e.g. 'apps/my-admin'

serverPath.description: the path in the repo where to save the generated files of the server. e.g. 'apps/my-server'
